body.p: Starting with version 17.1, includes support for some DITA 1.3 features.
To enable DITA 1.3 support in and use the DITA Open Toolkit for publishing, , go to DITA, and select the Built-in DITA OT 2.x radio button.
The publication of the full DITA 1.3 specifications can be found at .

The following table is a list of DITA 1.3 features and their implementation status in : DITA 1.3 Features Implementation Status
Feature Editing Publishing [DITA Open Toolkit is used]
DITA 1.3 DTD, XML Schema, and Relax NG-based maps/topics/tasks/references, etc.
New DITA 1.3 file templates. By default, DITA topics and maps that do not specify version in the DOCTYPE declaration are also considered to be DITA 1.3
